turtles.name: Greenie
turtles.description: Loves the color green, but ironically colorblind

turtles.name: Real Teal
dislikes: Orange, silver, mouth, and some other word that I can't think of off the top of my head

turtles.name: Indigogo
dislikes: Go go go go go go

turtles.name: King Violet
turtles.description: Acts all kingly and snobbish after reading that purple is a royal color on MeaningOfColors.biz

turtles.name: Pinky
turtles.description: As close to a pinky finger as a personality can get
likes: Being the skinniest in a group of five turtles

turtles.name: Overgrown Raspberry
turtles.description: Raspberry pretending to be a turtle (or turtle pretending to be a raspberry?)

turtles.name: Earthworm
dislikes: Sunny weather that immediately succeeds rain

turtles.name: Watermello
turtles.description: Looks like a watermelon and acts like one too

turtles.name: Forest
turtles.description: Hides behind trees in the presence of non-trees
